name: roast
detailedDescription: The team have outdone themselves. It's roast turkey with all the trimmings and yorkshire pudding.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's about $charges $chargeUnit of everything left but we'd prefer you only stuck to one helping so that everyone can eat and we can maintain our budget
attributes.smell: It's like new year and thanksgiving all rolled into one. The smell gives you a wonderful sense of well-being.
attributes.taste: Amazing! A complete free roast dinner never tasted so good.
